actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Census and Population.
Mr. Sawyer asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To designate June 25, 1990, as "Korean War Remembrance Day".

summary.text: Designates June 25, 1990, as Korean War Remembrance Day. Authorizes and requests the President to urge that the American flag be flown at half staff on such day in honor of the Americans who died as a result of their service in the Korean War.

titles.title: To designate June 25, 1990, as "Korean War Remembrance Day".
